suppress.notes: file name: UKHO.FileShareClient:any Suppress all vulnerabilities for this package as it is the old version of the package we're trying to build.

file name: System.Buffers:4.5.1 CVE-2022-41064 applies to System.Data.SqlClient/Microsoft.Data.SqlClient (not used). See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/239 CVE-2022-30184 patched in latest .NET Core 3.1/.NET 6 versions. See https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/en-US/vulnerability/CVE-2022-30184

file name: System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions.dll CVE-2020-22475 applies to Tasks.org Android app. See https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-22475 CVE-2022-39349 applies to Tasks.org Android app. See https://securitylab.github.com/advisories/GHSL-2022-062_Tasks_org
file name: System.Text.Json:9.0.0 Fixed in latest version of .NET 8
